name: Iconic Biz Media
overview: Iconic Biz Media provides global internet users interactive media to provide support, assistance, and guidance throughout their life. we are really in the business of Convenience, Connections and Customization - what we shall henceforth refer to as “The 3Cs of IBM” We cater to user requirements, such as getting married, to printing their personal classified ads across media houses in the country, to buying their dream home or choicest commercial property, and their professional requirements by finding them their perfect job through India’s leading e-recruitment services
